channel.title: HackTheBox Weekly Challenge - Chaos
channel.description:
Hi 0x00ers!
As you may be aware, this was originally an initiative started by our own @anon1115000 to help people get into HackTheBox and not feel alone while they're working away and building their skillsets.
Due to a very intense OSCP training on @anon1115000's part and job hunting, I will be taking the reigns for a little while until he is back in action!
So without further ado, I present this weeks post:
-------
# [Chaos](https://www.hackthebox.eu/home/machines/profile/167)
## Box Info I thoroughly enjoyed this box. Getting user on this was chaotic, to say the least. Enumeration is a key part of this, so be sure to leave no stone unturned!
OS: Linux Difficulty: Medium Points: 30 Release Date: 15 Dec 2018
![download|690x321](upload://hjgupWiImYwG5NAlmo1flsVgJKA.png)
Thread Rules:
* No Spoilers * [spoiler]No Spoilers[/spoiler] * If you need to ask a question, please use `[spoiler][/spoiler]` tags if you think it'll reveal information * Hints are allowed if they are vague, and oddly cryptic. Paint an [Escher](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/M._C._Escher) painting with your words * Feel free to post that you pwned a box, but no write-ups. Nada * Asking for help without effort on your part will be met with near fatal doses of sarcasm
N.B: I will be watching the HTB twitter to know what challenges are being decommissioned so we don't lose forward progress in our rankings. They release this info on every 6-8 days so this post will always be on a Thursday/Friday. This is no guarantee however as they might decommission the week after. It's a numbers game so if we keep pwning we keep ranking up.
If you're interested in joining our HTB Team, please read more [here](https://0x00sec.org/t/join-the-0x00sec-hackthebox-team-today/8125).

item.title: HackTheBox Weekly Challenge - Chaos
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

item.title: HackTheBox Weekly Challenge - Chaos
item.dc:creator: pry0cc
item.description:
Hi 0x00ers!

As you may be aware, this was originally an initiative started by our own @anon1115000 to help people get into HackTheBox and not feel alone while they’re working away and building their skillsets.

Due to a very intense OSCP training on @anon1115000’s part and job hunting, I will be taking the reigns for a little while until he is back in action!

So without further ado, I present this weeks post:

Chaos

Box Info

I thoroughly enjoyed this box. Getting user on this was chaotic, to say the least. Enumeration is a key part of this, so be sure to leave no stone unturned!

OS: Linux
Difficulty: Medium
Points: 30
Release Date: 15 Dec 2018

Thread Rules:

  • No Spoilers
  • spoiler
  • If you need to ask a question, please use [spoiler][/spoiler] tags if you think it’ll reveal information
  • Hints are allowed if they are vague, and oddly cryptic. Paint an Escher painting with your words
  • Feel free to post that you pwned a box, but no write-ups. Nada
  • Asking for help without effort on your part will be met with near fatal doses of sarcasm

N.B:
I will be watching the HTB twitter to know what challenges are being decommissioned so we don’t lose forward progress in our rankings. They release this info on every 6-8 days so this post will always be on a Thursday/Friday. This is no guarantee however as they might decommission the week after. It’s a numbers game so if we keep pwning we keep ranking up.

If you’re interested in joining our HTB Team, please read more here.

Read full topic
